borderRadius.$description: checkbox.borderRadius — Checkbox border radius (2px). Minimal rounding maintains the traditional square checkbox shape while softening hard corners. Distinguishes from radio buttons (which are circular).

borderWidth.$description: checkbox.borderWidth — Checkbox border width (1px). Thin border provides clear boundary without visual heaviness. Thickens visually when checked due to fill color.

ringOffset.$description: checkbox.focus.ringOffset — Focus ring offset (2px). Space between checkbox border and focus ring. Prevents ring from overlapping checkbox border.

ringWidth.$description: checkbox.focus.ringWidth — Focus ring width (2px). Clearly visible ring around checkbox when focused via keyboard. Essential for accessibility compliance.

lg.$description: checkbox.icon.size.lg — Large checkmark size (14px). Proportional to lg checkbox. More prominent check for better visibility.

md.$description: checkbox.icon.size.md — Medium checkmark size (10px). DEFAULT. Proportional to md checkbox. Clear visual feedback for checked state.

sm.$description: checkbox.icon.size.sm — Small checkmark size (9px). Proportional to sm checkbox. Slightly larger than xs for better recognition.

xl.$description: checkbox.icon.size.xl — Extra large checkmark size (16px). Proportional to xl checkbox. Maximum visibility checkmark.

xs.$description: checkbox.icon.size.xs — Extra small checkmark size (8px). Proportional to xs checkbox. Keep stroke weight consistent for visibility at small size.

strokeWidth.$description: checkbox.icon.strokeWidth — Checkmark stroke width (2.5px). Bold enough to be clearly visible at all sizes. Consistent thickness ensures recognition across the size scale.

fontSize.$description: checkbox.label.fontSize — Label font size (14px). Standard body text size for form labels. Readable alongside checkbox without overwhelming.

gap.$description: checkbox.label.gap — Gap between checkbox and label (12px). Provides clear visual separation while maintaining association. Label click should toggle checkbox.

lg.$description: checkbox.size.lg — Large checkbox size (24px). Use for: touch-optimized interfaces, accessibility-focused forms, prominent single options. Better for mobile devices.

md.$description: checkbox.size.md — Medium checkbox size (20px). DEFAULT size. Use for: most forms, settings panels, standalone checkboxes. Good balance of visibility and space efficiency.

sm.$description: checkbox.size.sm — Small checkbox size (16px). Use for: standard form density, inline options, filter panels. Common in desktop applications.

xl.$description: checkbox.size.xl — Extra large checkbox size (28px). Use for: high-emphasis standalone toggles, large touch targets, accessibility requirements. Maximum visibility and tap target size.

xs.$description: checkbox.size.xs — Extra small checkbox size (14px). Use for: compact data tables, dense lists, space-constrained UIs. May not meet touch target guidelines (44px) - consider for mouse-only interfaces.

duration.$description: checkbox.transition.duration — Checkbox transition duration (100ms). Fast transition for snappy feedback when toggling. Should feel instant but smooth.

easing.$description: checkbox.transition.easing — Checkbox transition easing (ease-out). Decelerating motion feels natural for check/uncheck toggle actions.
